text: Thomas P. Bossert (born March 25, 1975) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the Homeland Security Advisor to U.S. President Donald Trump from 2017 to 2018. Bossert is an ABC News Homeland Security analyst. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Lawyers from Pennsylvania Category:American political commentators Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Tom Bossert
